text: Iss liye jo shaks aap kay pass iss ilm kay aajaney kay baad bhi aap say iss mein jhagray to aap keh den kay aao hum tum apney apney farzandon ko aur hum tum apni apni aurton ko aur hum tum khas apni apni janon ko bula len phir hum aajzi kay sath iltija keren aur jhooton per Allah ki laanat keren
